Module com.example.project3rubank
Package com.example.project3rubank.bank

Class CertificateDeposit

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3rubank.bank.Account
com.example.project3rubank.bank.Savings
com.example.project3rubank.bank.CertificateDeposit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Account>
public class CertificateDeposit extends Savings
The Certificate Deposit account type class that extends the Savings class. Also calculates the interest and penalties for CD accounts.

  • Constructor Details

    • CertificateDeposit

      public CertificateDeposit(AccountNumber number, Profile holder, double balance, boolean isLoyal, int term, Date open)
      Creates a Certificate Deposit account with the listed parameters.
      Parameters:
      number - The account number.
      holder - The profile holder.
      balance - Initial balance of the account.
      isLoyal - Loyalty status for CD accounts (always loyal).
      term - The length of the term for a CD account (in months).
      open - The date the account was opened.

  • Method Details

    • getInterestRate

      private double getInterestRate()
      Private helper method to get the interest rate based on the term selected.
      Returns:
      The interest rate for the selected term.

    • calculateDaysBetween

      private int calculateDaysBetween(Calendar openDateCal, Calendar closeDateCal)
      Private helper method that calculates the number of days between two Calendar instances.
      Parameters:
      openDateCal - The opening date as a Calendar object.
      closeDateCal - The closing date as a Calendar object.
      Returns:
      The number of days between startCal and endCal.

    • calculateCommonWithdrawalData

      private double[] calculateCommonWithdrawalData(Date close)
      Helper method to calculate common operations for penalty and closing interest.
      Parameters:
      close - The closing date of the account.
      Returns:
      The number of days the account was open and the early withdrawal rate.

    • getMaturityDate

      public Date getMaturityDate()
      Private helper method to calculate the maturity date of the CD account.
      Returns:
      The maturity data of the CD account.

    • interest

      public double interest()
      Calculates the monthly interest for a certificate deposit account.
      Overrides:
      interest in class Savings
      Returns:
      The monthly interest for a CD account.

    • calculatePenalty

      public double calculatePenalty(Date close)
      Method to calculate and return the penalty amount for early withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      close - The date the account was closed on.
      Returns:
      The penalty amount.

    • calculateClosingInterest

      public double calculateClosingInterest(Date close)
      Method to calculate the closing interest for a certificate deposit account, depending on whether the account was closed before or after maturity.
      Parameters:
      close - The date the account was closed on.
      Returns:
      The closing interest for the account, after subtracting the penalty.

    • getTerm

      public int getTerm()
      Gets the term for the account
      Returns:
      The term chosen for the account.

    • getOpen

      public Date getOpen()
      Gets the open date for the account
      Returns:
      the open date for cd account.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the CD account information (including Term, Date opened and Maturity date details).
      Overrides:

      Returns:
      String representation of the CD account information.
